# relativeTime

**Instance Property**

The time at which this parameter curve is applied, relative to the start time of the pattern.

## Declaration

```swift
var relativeTime: TimeInterval { get set }
```

## Describing the Curve

- **controlPoints**: An array containing the curve’s control points.
- **parameterID**: The parameter ID defining the type of parameter that the curve represents.
